# set ignore plan
"set @@debug = '+P'"
{
  "QueryType": "SET",
  "Original": "set @@debug = '+P'",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "Set",
    "Variant": "",
    "Ops": [
      {
        "Name": "debug",
        "PlanValue": "+P"
      }
    ]
  }
}

# set check and ignore plan
"set @@sql_mode = concat(@@sql_mode, ',NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER')"
{
  "QueryType": "SET",
  "Original": "set @@sql_mode = concat(@@sql_mode, ',NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER')",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "Set",
    "Variant": "",
    "Ops": [
      {
        "Name": "sql_mode",
        "Keyspace": {
          "Name": "main",
          "Sharded": false
        },
        "TargetDestination": null,
        "CurrentSysVarQuery": "select @@sql_mode from dual",
        "NewSysVarQuery": "select concat(@@sql_mode, ',NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER') from dual"
      }
    ]
  }
}

# set plan building not supported
"set @@innodb_strict_mode = OFF"
"plan building not supported"
